sig_info: Whenever Logan gains one of his 0 Damage Passive Bleeds, it has a 25 to 64.99% chance to gain +400% duration.
Logan’s first Special Attack each fight gains +41 to 109.31 Attack rating.

Old Man Logan gains a Regeneration Buff which heals 102.3 Health over 20 seconds. While this Regeneration Buff is active, incoming Bleed effects gain +50% duration but suffer -95% Potency, giving Logan more time to deal with them.
ALWAYS ACTIVE: You can’t teach an old, stubborn dog new tricks. Logan’s Ability Accuracy cannot be decreased or increased.
WHILE NOT FIGHTING TECH CHAMPIONS: Logan gains +400 base Critical Resistance and his Special Attack 3 ignores Armor Rating.
LANDING ATTACKS, BLOCKING ATTACKS & BEIN: Logan has a 75% chance to gain a Passive Bleed, lasting 5 seconds which deals 0 damage. Max: 15 Stacks.
OPPONENT PURIFIES A BLEED: Logan’s deep-cutting Adamantium causes the opponent to instantly take 61.5 direct damage for each Bleed they Purified.
HEAVY ATTACKS: First hit has a 100% chance to Refresh the duration of Logan’s 0 damage Passive Bleed effects.
Second hit has a 100% chance to Pause the duration of all active Fury Buffs for 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Logan removes all Regeneration Buffs and Bleed effects from himself, gaining 1 Fury Buff for each effect removed this way. These Buffs last 12 seconds and grant +10.66 Attack. Max Stacks: 15.
Special Attacks are Unblockable if Logan has 5 or more Fury Buffs.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 533.33 for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 80% chance per strike to inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 57.4 direct damage over 5 seconds.
Each Critical Hit also has a 80% chance to inflict a Critical Bleed, lasting 5 seconds and dealing 57.4 damage, multiplied by Logan's Critical Damage Multiplier.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a Deep Bleed Debuff which counts as a Bleed effect, lasting 35 seconds and dealing 123 direct damage.
If Logan has 5 or more Fury Buffs, inflict an additional Deep Bleed.
While Deep Bleed is active, Logan’s attacks gain +533.33 Critical Rating and ignore Physical Resistance.
Gain 100% Armor Penetration in this attack. No effect against Tech Champions.

HEAVY ATTACKS: First hit has a 100% chance to Refresh the duration of Logan’s 0 damage Passive Bleed effects.
Second hit has a 100% chance to Pause the duration of all active Fury Buffs for 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Logan removes all Regeneration Buffs and Bleed effects from himself, gaining 1 Fury Buff for each effect removed this way. These Buffs last 12 seconds and grant +111.93 Attack. Max Stacks: 15.
Special Attacks are Unblockable if Logan has 5 or more Fury Buffs.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 650 for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 80% chance per strike to inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 602.7 direct damage over 5 seconds.
Each Critical Hit also has a 80% chance to inflict a Critical Bleed, lasting 5 seconds and dealing 602.7 damage, multiplied by Logan's Critical Damage Multiplier.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a Deep Bleed Debuff which counts as a Bleed effect, lasting 35 seconds and dealing 1291.5 direct damage.
If Logan has 5 or more Fury Buffs, inflict an additional Deep Bleed.
While Deep Bleed is active, Logan’s attacks gain +650 Critical Rating and ignore Physical Resistance.
Gain 100% Armor Penetration in this attack. No effect against Tech Champions.
